name: fluidic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving or relating to fluids (= substances that flow and are not solid): Roughly 60% of our body weight comes from water, the fluidic equivalent of 40 litres. In the case of this particular virus, infection can only occur through direct fluidic contact.
More examplesFewer examplesThe mechanical part of the heart is centred on the fluidic movement of blood.These bodily tissues are isolated from the fluidic parts of the body's interior.We are a leading manufacturer of pre-assembled fluidic systems.
